content: I have joined IDEAS NCBR, where I will work on Zero-Waste Machine Learning in Computer Vision in the group led by prof. Tomasz Trzci≈Ñski.
HyperShot: Few-Shot Learning by Kernel HyperNetworks accepted to WACV 2023!
MisConv: Convolutional Neural Networks for Missing Data accepted to WACV 2022!
"In time, you will call me Master." - I completed my Master's Degree at Jagiellonian University.
I was awarded the Polish Minister's of National Education and Science scholarship for best students. The scholarship was awarded to 362 best students in Poland.
